Class LenientDataSourceCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.catalog.DataSourceCatalog
      • org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.catalog.LenientDataSourceCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Catalog, Pagination

    public class LenientDataSourceCatalog
extends DataSourceCatalog
    Version:
    $Revision$

    Extension of DataSourceCatalog that can accomodate dynamic fields.

    Author:
    luca
